name: playwright-test-framework
description: Extensible Playwright test framework with API and UI wrappers

scripts.verify: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const script = process.platform === 'win32' ? 'verify-setup.bat' : './verify-setup.sh'; if (fs.existsSync(script)) { require('child_process').spawn(script, [], {stdio: 'inherit', shell: true}); } else { console.log('Run npm run setup first'); }"
scripts.test:headed: npm run setup:check && node scripts/run-with-env.js HEADLESS=false playwright test --headed
scripts.test:api: npm run setup:check && playwright test src/tests/api
scripts.test:integration: npm run setup:check && playwright test src/tests/integration
scripts.test:retry: npm run setup:check && node scripts/run-with-env.js RETRY_COUNT=3 playwright test src/tests/integration/retry-example.test.ts
scripts.test:retry-ui: npm run setup:check && node scripts/run-with-env.js RETRY_COUNT=3 playwright test src/tests/ui/login-with-retry.ui.test.ts
scripts.test:no-retry: npm run setup:check && node scripts/run-with-env.js RETRY_COUNT=0 playwright test
scripts.test:max-retry: npm run setup:check && node scripts/run-with-env.js RETRY_COUNT=5 playwright test
